long_description: The Gerber GDC Hook knife rides along with the keys on your keychain so you have a reliable, stealthy and easy-to-access blade at your fingertips for all kinds of routine or emergency cutting tasks. In an emergency, use the razor-sharp, stainless-steel 2 in. hook blade to cut yourself out of a piece of clothing, seat belt or other safety strap. Use the GDC Hook knife to open a box or an envelope, cut fishing line, trim a tarp, open freeze-dried food packaging and hundreds of other routine uses. Wrap your finger around the ring and press your thumb against the thumb grip for a solid hold that won't budge when you put a bit of power behind a cut. When you're done, the blade snaps back into its sturdy sheath. Gerber GDC Hook knife has a circular, aluminum handle with thumb grip; comes with a keychain ring on sheath.
short_description: The Gerber GDC Hook knife rides along with the keys on your keychain so you have a reliable, stealthy and easy-to-access blade at your fingertips for all kinds of routine or emergency cutting tasks.
